#Graphical cultures that do not exist within the game/mod that were in CoW that caused thousands of errors
#magyar_building_gfx		
#berber_building_gfx		
#goidelic_building_gfx celtic_building_gfx		
#british_building_gfx		
#caucasian_building_gfx		
#southslavic_building_gfx	
#burman_building_gfx		
#ethiopian_building_gfx		
#german_building_gfx

#scandinavian_building_gfx

#tundra_building_gfx			#Just randomly attached to steppe

burge_sprawl_7 = {
	is_graphical_background = yes
  
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_7
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_7
		graphical_cultures = { western_building_gfx german_building_gfx scandinavian_building_gfx saxon_building_gfx magyar_building_gfx goidelic_building_gfx celtic_building_gfx british_building_gfx norse_building_gfx slavic_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_western graphical_mediterranean graphical_steppe }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_med_7
		graphical_cultures = { mediterranean_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_med_7
		graphical_cultures = { caucasian_building_gfx southslavic_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_western graphical_mediterranean graphical_steppe graphical_mena }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_med_7
		graphical_cultures = { byzantine_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_med_7
		graphical_cultures = { steppe_building_gfx tundra_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_iberia_7
		graphical_cultures = { iberian_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean }
		requires_dlc_flag = the_fate_of_iberia
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_mena_7
		graphical_cultures = { mena_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_mena }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_mena_7
		graphical_cultures = { steppe_building_gfx tundra_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_mena_7
		graphical_cultures = { berber_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_barracks_monastery_city_farm_sahelian
		graphical_cultures = { sahelian_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_barracks_monastery_city_farm_guinean
		graphical_cultures = { african_building_gfx somali_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_indian_07
		graphical_cultures = { indian_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_indian_07
		graphical_cultures = { burman_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_india graphical_mena graphical_sea }
		
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_indian_07
		graphical_cultures = { ethiopian_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_india graphical_mena }
		
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_persia_7
		graphical_cultures = { iranian_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
		
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_barracks_monastery_city_farm_chinese
		graphical_cultures = { chinese_building_gfx korean_building_gfx yamato_building_gfx } #Attached Japan to these burges since this layout obviously fits Japans major cities more than the default western walls
		graphical_regions = { graphical_india graphical_mena graphical_steppe }
		
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_barracks_monastery_city_farm_tibetan
		graphical_cultures = { tibetan_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_india graphical_steppe }
		
	}
	is_enabled = { 
		has_game_rule = use_backgrounds 
		has_holding = yes
		OR = {
			has_building = castle_07
			has_building = city_07
			
		}
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_paris }		
		NOT = { this = province:2333 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_london	}		
		NOT = { this = province:1527 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_roma }		
		NOT = { this = province:2575 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_constantinople }		
		NOT = { this = province:496 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_marrakesh }		
		NOT = { this = province:4718 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_bruges}		
		NOT = { this = province:2115 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_thessaloniki}		
		NOT = { this = province:490 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_baghdad }		
		NOT = { this = province:4828 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_jerusalem }		
		NOT = { this = province:5965 }
		NOT = { this = province:2466 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_bukhara }		
		NOT = { this = province:4394 }
		NOR = {
			has_building_or_higher = "walls_of_genoa_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "theodosian_walls_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "aurelian_walls_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "city_wall_of_toledo_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "roman_wall_of_lugo_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "MA_nikaea_walls"
			has_building_or_higher = "MA_walls_sanaa"
		}
	}
}


burge_sprawl_6 = {
	is_graphical_background = yes
  
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_6
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_6

	}

	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_barracks_monastery_city_farm_chinese
		graphical_cultures = { chinese_building_gfx korean_building_gfx yamato_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_india graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_china graphical_japan graphical_korea }
		
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_barracks_monastery_city_farm_tibetan
		graphical_cultures = { tibetan_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_india graphical_steppe }
		
	}
	is_enabled = { 
		has_game_rule = use_backgrounds

		# NOT = { barony = title:b_paris }

		NOT = { this = province:4718 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_bruges}		
		NOT = { this = province:2115 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_thessaloniki}		
		NOT = { this = province:490 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_baghdad }		
		NOT = { this = province:4828 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_jerusalem }		
		NOT = { this = province:5965 }
		NOT = { this = province:2466 }
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_bukhara }		
		NOT = { this = province:4394 }
		NOR = {
			has_building_or_higher = "walls_of_genoa_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "theodosian_walls_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "aurelian_walls_01"

		}
	}

burge_sprawl = {

		name = burge_sprawl_5
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_5
		graphical_cultures = { western_building_gfx german_building_gfx scandinavian_building_gfx saxon_building_gfx magyar_building_gfx goidelic_building_gfx celtic_building_gfx british_building_gfx norse_building_gfx slavic_building_gfx }

		graphical_cultures = { mediterranean_building_gfx }

	}

	}
	asset = {

		name = walls_05_barracks_monastery_city_farm_tibetan

		NOT = { this = province:490 }

burge_sprawl_genoa = {
	is_graphical_background = yes
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_genoa
	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_backgrounds has_holding = yes
		has_building_or_higher = castle_05
		# barony = title:b_genoa
		this = province:2466
	}
}

rome_burge_sprawl = {
	is_graphical_background = yes
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = rome_burge_sprawl
	}
	is_enabled = { 
		#has_game_rule = no_ma_included
		has_game_rule = use_backgrounds 
		has_holding = yes
		OR = {
			has_building_or_higher = castle_05
			has_building_or_higher = city_05
		}
		# barony = title:b_roma
		this = province:2575
	}
}

	is_graphical_background = yes
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = burge_sprawl_jerusalem_7
	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_backgrounds has_holding = yes
		has_building_or_higher = castle_06
		# barony = title:b_jerusalem

	}

toledo_sprawl = {
	is_graphical_background = yes

	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		name = "western_walls_00_mesh"
	}

	is_enabled = { 
		has_building_or_higher = "city_wall_of_toledo_01"
	}
}

	}

		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = walls_01_tribal }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = camp }
	}
}

		graphical_regions = { graphical_steppe graphical_mena graphical_india }
	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_constantinople }		
		NOT = { this = province:496 }
		
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = walls_02 }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = monastery }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = camp }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = city }
	}

		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = walls_01 }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = farm }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = city }
	}
}

		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_02_outpost_city_steppe
		graphical_cultures = { steppe_building_gfx tundra_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_steppe graphical_mena graphical_india }
	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_constantinople }		
		NOT = { this = province:496 }
		
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = walls_02 }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = outpost }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = city }
	}
}

		# NOT = { barony = title:b_constantinople }		
		NOT = { this = province:496 }

		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = barracks }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = stables }
	}

		graphical_cultures = { steppe_building_gfx tundra_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_steppe graphical_mena graphical_india }
	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_constantinople }		
		NOT = { this = province:496 }
		
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = walls_03 }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = barracks }
	}
}

	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_03_farm_sahelian
		graphical_cultures = { sahelian_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity

		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity

		graphical_cultures = { steppe_building_gfx tundra_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_steppe graphical_mena graphical_india }
	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_constantinople }		
		NOT = { this = province:496 }
		
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = walls_03 }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = farm }
	}
}

		NOT = { this = province:496 }

	}
	asset = {
		type = entity

		graphical_regions = { graphical_india graphical_mena }
	}

		name = walls_05_camp_roman

		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_camp_germanic
		graphical_cultures = { german_building_gfx scandinavian_building_gfx saxon_building_gfx magyar_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_camp_tibetan
		graphical_cultures = { tibetan_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_india graphical_steppe }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_camp_mena

	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_camp_mena

	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_camp_mena
		graphical_cultures = { iranian_building_gfx }

	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_camp_sahelian
		graphical_cultures = { sahelian_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_camp_guinean
		graphical_cultures = { african_building_gfx somali_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_05_camp_steppe
		graphical_cultures = { steppe_building_gfx tundra_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_steppe graphical_mena graphical_india }
	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_constantinople }		
		NOT = { this = province:496 }
		
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = walls_05 }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = camp }
	}
}



### WALLS ONE BUILDING ###

	}

	}
	asset = {
		type = entity

	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = walls_05 }
	}

		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = stables }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = camp }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = city }
	}
}

		type = entity
		name = monastery_city_farm_steppe
		graphical_cultures = { steppe_building_gfx tundra_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_steppe graphical_mena graphical_india }
	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_constantinople }		
		NOT = { this = province:496 }
		
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = monastery }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = farm }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = city }
	}
}

		graphical_regions = { graphical_india graphical_steppe }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = stables_city_camp_mena
		graphical_cultures = { mena_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = stables_city_camp_mena
		graphical_cultures = { berber_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = stables_city_camp_mena
		graphical_cultures = { iranian_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = stables_city_camp_sahelian
		graphical_cultures = { sahelian_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = stables_city_camp_guinean
		graphical_cultures = { african_building_gfx somali_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = stables_city_camp_steppe
		graphical_cultures = { steppe_building_gfx tundra_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_steppe graphical_mena graphical_india }
	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_constantinople }		
		NOT = { this = province:496 }
		
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = stables }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = camp }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = city }
	}
}



### TWO BUILDINGS ###

	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_constantinople }		
		NOT = { this = province:496 }
		
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = outpost }
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = camp }
	}
}

### ONE BUILDING ###

barracks = {
	is_graphical_background = yes
  
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = barracks_western
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = barracks_western
		graphical_cultures = { western_building_gfx goidelic_building_gfx celtic_building_gfx british_building_gfx }

	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = barracks_mediterranean

	}

### TRIBAL WALLS ###

walls_01_tribal = {
	is_graphical_background = yes
	asset = {
		type = entity
		names = { "tribal_walls_01_a_entity" "tribal_walls_01_b_entity" }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_01_guinean
		graphical_cultures = { african_building_gfx somali_building_gfx }
#		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = tribal_walls_01_b_mena_entity
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india graphical_mediterranean }
	}
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		# NOT = { barony = title:b_constantinople }		
		NOT = { this = province:496 }
		
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = walls_01_tribal }
	}
}



### NO WALLS NO BUILDINGS ###

walls_00 = {
	is_graphical_background = yes
	asset = {
		type = entity
		name = walls_00
	}
	is_enabled = {
		has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = walls_00 }
	}
}

### SPECIAL NO HOLDING VISIBLE ###

walls_00_no_holding = {
	is_graphical_background = yes
	# This is an empty asset with no locators to spawn no holding graphics.
	is_enabled = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl
		
		has_sprawl_building = { BUILDING = walls_00_no_holding }
	}
}



### NO SPRAWL GAME RULE ###

# These buildings are only for showing background graphics, e.g. the walls around holdings

# No Walls
walls_00_reg = {
	is_graphical_background = yes

	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		name = "western_walls_00_mesh"
	}

	is_enabled = {
		NOT = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl }
		OR = {
			AND = {
				is_county_capital = no
				fort_level < 1
			}
			# Using the no_wall holding graphics for cities with special walls so that they don't have double walls
			has_building_or_higher = "city_wall_of_toledo_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "roman_wall_of_lugo_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "kano_walls_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "jaisalmer_fort_01"
		}
	}
}

# Any city that must be sieged gets the basic walls
walls_01_tribal_reg = {
	is_graphical_background = yes

	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		names = {
			"tribal_walls_01_a_mesh"
		}
	}

	is_enabled = {
		NOT = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl }
		OR = {
			is_county_capital = yes
			fort_level > 0
		}
		NOR = {
			# disabling this level of walled graphics for holdings with special walls and other fortifications so that they always look appropriately fortified. Note: If any of these buildings are given unique 3D assets, this should be looked at again.
			has_building_or_higher = "palisades_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "curtain_walls_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "hill_forts_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "ramparts_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "watchtowers_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "theodosian_walls_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "walls_of_benin_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "walls_of_genoa_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "aurelian_walls_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "city_wall_of_toledo_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "roman_wall_of_lugo_01"
		}
	}
}

# Here the Fort Level building chains take control of the visuals
walls_01_reg = {
	is_graphical_background = yes
	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		graphical_cultures = { western_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		names = {
			"western_walls_01_a_mesh"
			"western_walls_01_b_mesh"
		}
	}
	
	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		graphical_cultures = { british_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		names = {
			"western_walls_01_a_mesh"
			"western_walls_01_b_mesh"
		}
	}
	
	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		graphical_cultures = { goidelic_building_gfx celtic_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		names = {
			"western_walls_01_a_mesh"
			"western_walls_01_b_mesh"
		}
	}
	
	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		graphical_cultures = { german_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }

		}

		}
	}

		type = pdxmesh

		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		names = {
			"fp1_norse_walls_01_mesh"
		}
	}
	
	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		graphical_cultures = { slavic_building_gfx }

		}
	}
	
	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		graphical_cultures = { ethiopian_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		names = {

	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh

		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		names = {

			"mena_walls_01_b_mesh"
		}
	}
	
	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		graphical_cultures = { burman_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		names = {
			"mena_walls_01_a_mesh"
			"mena_walls_01_b_mesh"
		}
	}
	
	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		graphical_cultures = { chinese_building_gfx korean_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		names = {
			"chinese_walls_01_mesh"
		}
	}
	
	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		graphical_cultures = { tibetan_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		names = {
			"chinese_walls_01_mesh"
		}
	}
	
	
	is_enabled = {
		NOT = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl }
		OR = {
			# These buildings will trigger the visual "upgrade" to this wall asset
			has_building_or_higher = "palisades_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "curtain_walls_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "hill_forts_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "ramparts_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "watchtowers_01"
		}
		NOR = {
			# Disabling this level of walled graphics for holdings with special walls and other fortifications so that they always look appropriately fortified. Note: If any of these buildings are given unique 3D assets, this should be looked at again.
			has_building_or_higher = "palisades_02"
			has_building_or_higher = "curtain_walls_02"
			has_building_or_higher = "hill_forts_02"
			has_building_or_higher = "ramparts_02"
			has_building_or_higher = "watchtowers_02"
			has_building_or_higher = "theodosian_walls_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "walls_of_benin_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "walls_of_genoa_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "aurelian_walls_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "city_wall_of_toledo_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "roman_wall_of_lugo_01"
		}
	}
}

			"india_walls_03_a_mesh"
		}
	}
	
	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		graphical_cultures = { chinese_building_gfx korean_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		names = {
			"chinese_walls_03_mesh"
		}
	}
	
	asset = {
		type = pdxmesh
		graphical_cultures = { tibetan_building_gfx }
		graphical_regions = { graphical_mediterranean graphical_western graphical_mena graphical_steppe graphical_india }
		names = {
			"chinese_walls_03_mesh"
		}
	}
	
	is_enabled = {
		NOT = { has_game_rule = use_sprawl }
		scope:holder = {
			NOT = { government_has_flag = government_is_tribal }
		}
		OR = {
			# These buildings will trigger the visual "upgrade" to this wall asset
			has_building_or_higher = "curtain_walls_03"
			has_building_or_higher = "hill_forts_03"
			has_building_or_higher = "ramparts_03"
			has_building_or_higher = "watchtowers_03"
			has_building_or_higher = "walls_of_benin_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "walls_of_genoa_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "aurelian_walls_01"
		}
		NOR = {
			# Disabling this level of walled graphics for holdings with special walls and other fortifications so that they always look appropriately fortified. Note: If any of these buildings are given unique 3D assets, this should be looked at again.
			has_building_or_higher = "curtain_walls_06"
			has_building_or_higher = "hill_forts_06"
			has_building_or_higher = "ramparts_06"
			has_building_or_higher = "watchtowers_06"
			has_building_or_higher = "theodosian_walls_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "city_wall_of_toledo_01"
			has_building_or_higher = "roman_wall_of_lugo_01"
		}
	}
}
